page.title: 16Goudhurst News,local papers.
page.content: A boy of l6 admitted trying to steal petrol from an unattended car at Lurkins Rise, Goudhurst. He was fined sixty pounds at Tunbridge Wells juvenile court. A group of youths ran off when the owner returned but were later arrested and charged. The Agricultural Street Players collected 350 pounds this year towards Pembury Hospital special baby unit. The group hopes to continue next year performing melodrama at pubs for charities. The Youth Club needs more helpers on Fridays. The Wives group held a Tupperware party at the church room in aid of Readycall. One estate agent is advertising two houses in the area - a three bedroomed cottage with quarter acre of secluded garden for 86 thousand and a semi-detached cottage for 58 thousand. Mother and son injured in a collision between their jeep & a car.
